commentBody:
Judge Gorsuch is a nonstarter because he’s a religious conservative who will pass down rulings that bow to the will of the Invisible Sky People to whom he owes his primary allegiance. Democrats need to fight this nomination with the same vigor with which Mitch McConnell fought Mr. Obama’s nominee.

But that’s not the main story here.

We’re only a few days into the Administration from Hell, and the Gropemeister-in-Chief has soiled everything he has touched. He has managed to pollute a political process that we thought could not get any worse.

He is the Id of the Republican Party. He congealed from the sneering hatred that Republicans had for Mr. Obama, from their disdain for his intelligence, style and grace, from his insistence on helping people who needed help and from his initiatives that treated all citizens equally, and with respect.

This elevated game show host has brought malignant forces into the White House that are determined to make it whiter. His massive ego is preoccupied with perceived slights. He is mentally unstable, inventing his own facts, lashing out at the press and ejecting crucial personnel from vital security discussions. The emperor is not merely naked; he’s dressed in a pinafore, with a lollipop for a scepter.

Who cares who he puts forth for the Court? Every appointment would be guaranteed to diminish our hard-fought freedoms.

Freedom is just another word for something the president plans to take away from us.

comments.commentBody: It's only been 10 days...I'm betting the Democratic resistance WILL become even more effective than the Tea Party in days to come.

Gorsuch will likely be confirmed within a few weeks.

But he will ALWAYS be Justice Stolen Seat. McConnell and Grassley's actions, aided and abetted by a Republican Party that has become increasingly racist, increasingly misogynistic, increasingly greedy and increasingly sociopathic since at least Nixon.

The GOP is a national disgrace; this administration is making the US an international one.

I feel for the coming generations who will have to clean up the mess being left behind -- if that can actually be done.

Keep whistling in the dark, Richard. From what you've written about yourself, I gather an unwanted pregnancy isn't a fear for you and your Social Security isn't in danger and your health insurance isn't in danger and you're not poor and so on and so on so the rich white guy cabal will treat you just fine.

The heck with everyone else.
